Title: The Doorman
Plot: The doorman in Mr. Pitt's building causes trouble for Jerry who was only trying to be nice. Kramer robs George on the street for some German tourists. George's father is living with him and when he removes his shirt, George and Kramer see that he has breasts. So, Kramer develops a new undergarment for males ("The Bro" or "The Manssiere") that will alleviate this problem. Jerry offers his soiled couch to replace the one that was stolen while he was "on duty."
GuestStars: Deck McKenzie, Jerry Stiller, Estelle Harris, Ian Abercrombie, Larry Miller, Patrick Cronin, Reni Santoni, Edith Fields, Nick Jameson, Jack Betts, Barbara Pilavin, Toni Sawyer, Nigel Gibbs, Trudi Forristal
